author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MARIO MAINTAINING INTENSITY WHILE PASSING NEAR SOCORRO ISLAND.. SUMMARY OF 800 PM MST...0300 UTC...INFORMATION
summary: ...MARIO MAINTAINING INTENSITY WHILE PASSING NEAR SOCORRO ISLAND.. SUMMARY OF 800 PM MST...0300 UTC...INFORMATION As of 8:00 PM MST Sun Sep 14 the center of Mario was located near 19.2, -111.5 with movement WNW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Mario (EP3/EP132025)
